application.pane.resources.stocktablepane

Class StockTablePane

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.pane.resources.stocktablepane.StockTablePane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class StockTablePane
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is a Controller loaded from a .fxml file.

    Controls the TableView of all the Stocks in the program.
